note.p: Birth: Novelda, Alicante, Spain (1712 or 05 January 1713)
Death: Madrid, Spain (21 June or 21 July 1773)

Notes: DSB and Pogg give birth date as 1713; index to BR gives 1712 or 1713. DSB gives death date as 21 July 1773. Alternative names: BR gives both versions; 'Santacilla' is the one given in R; Pogg gives 'Santacilia'; DSB gives 'Juan y Santacilla'
